title: Galicia es una mierda (2008)
description:
First LP from Galizan group "Ataque Escampe" (a word play hard to translate) with erratic style and lots of inner references to Galizan culture and its troubles, including the "national issue", Leninism, movie and film and musical references, the problems of Galizan language, the problem of galizan self-esteem, etc.  From their own presentation: "Ataque Escampe wants to gather in 47 minutes of disperse music and arid sound all the contradictions existing in Galiza, in the world and in the history of music. From Manuel Antonio to Os Tonechos, from John Wayne to Lenin, from Neil Young to the Panchos. The interpretation, in the best of cases, will be in the ears of those who listen. Or it won&#039;t be."
